name: Daisy Zhang
intro: Hi, I'm Alice! I'm passionate about coding, especially in Python and JavaScript. I enjoy working on web development projects and am currently exploring AI and machine learning. Let's collaborate on some cool tech ideas!

name: David
intro: I love combining biology and engineering to solve healthcare challenges. In my free time, I work on 3D printing prototypes and enjoy hiking.

name: Charlie
intro: I’m interested in ethics and how philosophy shapes our understanding of the world. I enjoy debating big ideas and writing essays on social issues.

name: Alex
intro: I love exploring different mediums, from painting to digital design. My work often reflects themes of identity and nature. I’m excited to share ideas and collaborate on creative projects!
